content.raw: Has there been any movement on this?  If we develop such a sensor and submit it as an enhancement, would that help?  I don't know if such a sensor exists in gazebo, but it would be very beneficial.  Does a point laser exist (as opposed to a line scanning laser)?  That would be sufficient...
